ðŸ“– Summary: NotelyVoice is a cross-platform note-taking application that leverages Whisper AI for accurate speech-to-text conversion. It offers rich text editing, offline capabilities, and seamless integration between voice recording and note creation. The application is designed for students, professionals, and anyone needing hands-free note-taking across Android and iOS devices.
